title: Overall [0â€“4]
stimulusHtml:
Scoring Criteria (Score Scale 0-4)

4 Correctly discusses both works and identifies at least two relevant issues concerning
how each artist conveys power and/or authority. Answer contains no significant errors.


3 Discusses both works and identifies at least two relevant issues regarding one work and
one relevant issue regarding the other. There may be errors.


2 Discusses both works and identifies one relevant issue specific to each work, OR
discusses two relevant issues regarding one work but none regarding the other.


1 Discusses one relevant issue regarding one work. Answer is mostly descriptive and/or
contains significant errors.


0 Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or
makes only incorrect statements.
descriptions:
Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or
makes only incorrect statements.

Discusses one relevant issue regarding one work. Answer is mostly descriptive and/or
contains significant errors.

Discusses both works and identifies one relevant issue specific to each work, OR
discusses two relevant issues regarding one work but none regarding the other.

Discusses both works and identifies at least two relevant issues regarding one work and
one relevant issue regarding the other. There may be errors.

Correctly discusses both works and identifies at least two relevant issues concerning
how each artist conveys power and/or authority. Answer contains no significant errors.
